channel.title: Best host?
channel.description:
i am looking for a windows vps/vds that supports aplications and moparscape.
Thanks

item.title: Best host?
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

[quote=“ianternet, post:4, topic:121066”][quote author=J03RY link=topic=170638.msg1579797#msg1579797 date=1183929846]

VPS is pointless tbh because if someone trys crash it can use 2+gb ram and if u use more than ur limit usualy 2GB if u pay like £75.00 / $150.00

Dude, your dumb… not all VPS hosting company’s ask for more money if they reach more Ram…
I know trust me my dad owns the flex servers… (dutch vps hosting)
[/quote]
YOUR STUPID
IM A MICROSOFT CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL JACK ASS[/quote]
Well, try to look in the Dbase of Beta testers… look for Wannes (alias Joery B) you will notice it is me… so dont talk about being cerified on microsoft… i’ve bin testing/searching and fixing things for macrosoft for about 3years now…

Read full topic
